dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2531 IH: United States-Israel Anti-Tunnel Cooperation Extension Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Schneider (for himself, Ms. Manning, Mr. Lamborn, and Mr. Pfluger) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2016 to extend the authority relating to cooperation between the United States and Israel on anti-tunnel defense capabilities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the United States-Israel Anti-Tunnel Cooperation Extension Act.

section.header: Extension of United States-Israel anti-tunnel cooperation
section.text: Section 1279(f) of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2016 (22 U.S.C. 8606 note) is amended by striking December 31, 2024 and inserting December 31, 2026.
